org.apache.hadoop.hive.accumulo.serde

Interface AccumuloRowIdFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeAccumuloRowIdFactory, DefaultAccumuloRowIdFactory

    public interface AccumuloRowIdFactory
    Interface for providing custom Accumulo RowID generation/parsing
